    • Uses of OSecurityRole in com.orientechnologies.orient.core.metadata.security

      Classes in com.orientechnologies.orient.core.metadata.security that implement OSecurityRole 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OImmutableRole 
      class  ORole
      Contains the user settings about security and permissions roles.
      Allowed operation are the classic CRUD, namely: CREATE READ UPDATE DELETE Mode = ALLOW (allow all but) or DENY (deny all but)
      class  OSystemRole
